DOC.brief_summary: To prospectively evaluate the long term metabolic and psychological effects of flexible intensive insulin therapy (FIT) courses in an unselected population of type 1 diabetic patients at the University of Basel Hospital. We hypothesize that both metabolic control and psychological parameters will improve.
DOC.brief_title: Flexible, Intensive Insulin Therapy in Patients With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: All patients participating in 5 consecutive FIT courses that began between April 2002 to April 2004
